rooms.description: Open concept living area with ample natural light and ventilation; ideal for hosting guests. Vastu-compliant orientation towards east to catch the morning sun.
Spacious bedroom designed with minimalistic decor and large windows for natural lighting. Placed in north corner as per Vastu principles.
Secondary bedroom that offers ample light and ventilation. Positioned to maintain symmetry with Master Bedroom.
Functional space for storage and household utilities; strategically located near kitchen.

openings.notes: Large entryway with glass accents to invite natural light, ensuring proper Vastu alignment.
Large windows designed for abundant morning light. Complies with Vastu principles by aligning with the east direction.
Additional window to balance natural ventilation and lighting; adheres to Vastu guidelines.

additional_features.description: Large balcony overlooking the garden, providing outdoor living space.
Dedicated entrance to the extensive garden area on the south side of the property.
